data.text:
Summer training camp is held for the sake of improving the 
abilities of Uma Musume. Silence Suzuka is also working hard 
with the same goal in mind.
data.processed:
󠁿Summer training camp is held for the sake of improving the 
󠁿abilities of Uma Musume. Silence Suzuka is also working hard 
󠁿with the same goal in mind.

data.text: There's only a few days left of training camp…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿There's only a few days left of training camp…

data.text:
It's unfortunate that we'll be leaving such 
a great place to focus on training.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Let's spend the remaining days with no regrets
choices.processed: <size=35>Let's spend the remaining days with no regrets</size>

data.processed:
󠁿It's unfortunate that we'll be leaving such 
󠁿a great place to focus on training.

data.text: Fufuu, of course.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Fufuu, of course.

data.text:
Ah… speaking of which, Trainer-san. 
About the triathalon competition…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Ah… speaking of which, Trainer-san. 
󠁿About the triathalon competition…

data.text:
Silence Suzuka is talking about a Triathalon that 
is held as part of the summer training camp.
data.processed:
󠁿Silence Suzuka is talking about a Triathalon that 
󠁿is held as part of the summer training camp.

data.text:
A triathalon consists of swimming, bicycling and 
a long-distance run at the end. It's something 
that requires quite a bit of stamina.

choices.text: I thought you weren't going to participate.
choices.processed: <size=39>I thought you weren't going to participate.</size>

choices.text: I thought you weren't going to participate.
choices.processed: <size=39>I thought you weren't going to participate.</size>

data.processed:
󠁿A triathalon consists of swimming, bicycling and 
󠁿a long-distance run at the end. It's something 
󠁿that requires quite a bit of stamina.

data.text:
Yes… my specialty is medium distance, and the only thing I can 
do is "escape" so I didn't think I was suited for it…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Yes… my specialty is medium distance, and the only thing I can 
󠁿do is "escape" so I didn't think I was suited for it…

data.text: But…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿But…

data.text: Um, Trainer-san. Would it be fine for me to enter?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Um, Trainer-san. Would it be fine for me to enter?

data.text: For the sake of having no regrets… I'd like to give it a try.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: In that case, I'll support you to the best of my abilities.
choices.processed: <size=30>In that case, I'll support you to the best of my abilities.</size>

choices.text: In that case, I'll support you to the best of my abilities.
choices.processed: <size=30>In that case, I'll support you to the best of my abilities.</size>

data.processed: 󠁿For the sake of having no regrets… I'd like to give it a try.

data.text: Yes, please. I'll also run to the best of my abilities.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Yes, please. I'll also run to the best of my abilities.

data.text:
And so, Silence Suzuka's participation in the Triathalon was 
decided. Then, the day of the race-
data.processed:
󠁿And so, Silence Suzuka's participation in the Triathalon was 
󠁿decided. Then, the day of the race-

data.text:
There are quite a few participants… I wonder if a lot of them 
are doing this as part of training…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿There are quite a few participants… I wonder if a lot of them 
󠁿are doing this as part of training…

data.text:
…but, I'm the same. From start to finish, 
I'll just run at my own pace.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Are you going to try something other than escape?
choices.processed: <size=32>Are you going to try something other than escape?</size>

choices.text: Are you going to try something other than escape?
choices.processed: <size=32>Are you going to try something other than escape?</size>

data.processed:
󠁿…but, I'm the same. From start to finish, 
󠁿I'll just run at my own pace.

data.text: No, I will run in the only way I can.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿No, I will run in the only way I can.

data.text: Um, Trainer-san. …will you listen to a request?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Um, Trainer-san. …will you listen to a request?

data.text: -A reward. I'd like you to prepare one and wait for me.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿-A reward. I'd like you to prepare one and wait for me.

data.text:
Um, that's right… Since there's going to be a Summer Festival 
tonight, how about accompanying me…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: I'll treat you at a food stall

data.processed:
󠁿Um, that's right… Since there's going to be a Summer Festival 
󠁿tonight, how about accompanying me…?

data.text: Thank you very much. Then… I'll be off.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Thank you very much. Then… I'll be off.

data.text: And so, at last, the Triathalon started.
data.processed: 󠁿And so, at last, the Triathalon started.

data.text:
First up, it's swimming in the open ocean! It may look calm, but 
swimming against the waves is a daunting endeavor!
data.name: Announcer Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿First up, it's swimming in the open ocean! It may look calm, but 
󠁿swimming against the waves is a daunting endeavor!

data.text:
Oh, the one that pulls ahead here is Silence Suzuka-san! Whether 
it's on the turf, or in the ocean, she won't give up the lead!
data.name: Announcer Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, the one that pulls ahead here is Silence Suzuka-san! Whether 
󠁿it's on the turf, or in the ocean, she won't give up the lead!

data.text: Suzuka-senpai is awesome!
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed: 󠁿Suzuka-senpai is awesome!

data.text:
But this is a Triathalon though. If she takes off like that at 
the start, she won't last until the end.
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
󠁿But this is a Triathalon though. If she takes off like that at 
󠁿the start, she won't last until the end.

data.text:
Despite those concerns, during the swimming and cycling portions 
of the race, Silence Suzuka pulled farther ahead.
data.processed:
󠁿Despite those concerns, during the swimming and cycling portions 
󠁿of the race, Silence Suzuka pulled farther ahead.

data.text: However, the long distance run at the end-
data.processed: 󠁿However, the long distance run at the end-

data.text:
We're finally at the Triathalon's finale! 
Silence Suzuka-san is still in the lead!
data.name: Announcer Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿We're finally at the Triathalon's finale! 
󠁿Silence Suzuka-san is still in the lead!

data.text:
However! Since she's been running full speed until now, she's 
greatly slowed down! The followers are catching up!
data.name: Announcer Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿However! Since she's been running full speed until now, she's 
󠁿greatly slowed down! The followers are catching up!

data.text: …Haa… haa… ku…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…Haa… haa… ku…!

data.text: From the goal, I can see Silence Suzuka's form approaching, but-
data.processed: 󠁿From the goal, I can see Silence Suzuka's form approaching, but-

data.text: As I thought, she must not have enough stamina left…
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed: 󠁿As I thought, she must not have enough stamina left…

data.text:
Hey, our voices might reach her from here, let's 
cheer her on! You can do it, Suzuka-senpai!
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
󠁿Hey, our voices might reach her from here, let's 
󠁿cheer her on! You can do it, Suzuka-senpai!

data.text:
This Triathalon is just a part of training, 
an unimportant event- but still…
data.processed:
󠁿This Triathalon is just a part of training, 
󠁿an unimportant event- but still…

data.text:
I didn't know if my voice would reach her, 
but I still cheered as loud as I could.
data.processed:
󠁿I didn't know if my voice would reach her, 
󠁿but I still cheered as loud as I could.

data.text: This scenery…I won't yield it to anyone!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿This scenery…I won't yield it to anyone!

data.text: Oh! Silence Suzuka-san once again increases her speed!
data.name: Announcer Uma Musume
data.processed: 󠁿Oh! Silence Suzuka-san once again increases her speed!

data.text: The others can't catch up! She's completely running away!
data.name: Announcer Uma Musume
data.processed: 󠁿The others can't catch up! She's completely running away!

data.text:
And just like that she keeps her lead, now - GOAL! The 
Triathalon's winner is Silence Suzuka-san!
data.name: Announcer Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿And just like that she keeps her lead, now - GOAL! The 
󠁿Triathalon's winner is Silence Suzuka-san!

data.text: (WHOOOOOOOOOA!!!)
data.name: Cheers
data.processed: 󠁿(WHOOOOOOOOOA!!!)

data.text:
The shaved ice was delicious. It tastes so much 
better after moving my body to the fullest.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Even more so, since you won.
Even more so, since you won.

data.processed:
󠁿The shaved ice was delicious. It tastes so much 
󠁿better after moving my body to the fullest.

data.text:
Even if it was a Triathalon, I still didn't want to give the lead 
to anyone… But since that's such a difficult thing to do, I 
wasn't planning on entering.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Even if it was a Triathalon, I still didn't want to give the lead 
󠁿to anyone… But since that's such a difficult thing to do, I 
󠁿wasn't planning on entering.

data.text:
But, just like the Meetup event, instead of thinking 
too hard about it, why not just simply run the way 
I want… that's what I was thinking.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿But, just like the Meetup event, instead of thinking 
󠁿too hard about it, why not just simply run the way 
󠁿I want… that's what I was thinking.

data.text:
The reason I'm able to think like this, 
is because of you, Trainer-san.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Participating was a good call, huh?
Participating was a good call, huh?

data.processed:
󠁿The reason I'm able to think like this, 
󠁿is because of you, Trainer-san.

data.text: Yes…Also, I've figured one more thing out.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Yes…Also, I've figured one more thing out.

data.text:
A place so quiet that I could only hear the wind 
and my beating heart, a world just for me… that 
was the most important scenery to me.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿A place so quiet that I could only hear the wind 
󠁿and my beating heart, a world just for me… that 
󠁿was the most important scenery to me.

data.text: …however, that's changed just a little bit.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…however, that's changed just a little bit.

data.text:
With nobody else around, the only thing 
I see infront of me is Trainer-san
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿With nobody else around, the only thing 
󠁿I see infront of me is Trainer-san

data.text: At the end, that was the scenery that pulled me forward.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: From here on, I'll be waiting at the goal
choices.processed: <size=42>From here on, I'll be waiting at the goal</size>

choices.text: From here on, I'll be waiting at the goal
choices.processed: <size=42>From here on, I'll be waiting at the goal</size>

data.processed: 󠁿At the end, that was the scenery that pulled me forward.

data.text: Fufuu, Thank you very much.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Fufuu, Thank you very much.

data.text:
No matter the race, I will definitely lead 
and return to Trainer-san's side.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿No matter the race, I will definitely lead 
󠁿and return to Trainer-san's side.

data.text:
Throughout this training camp, Silence Suzuka 
had not only improved her abilities, but had also 
grown enough to express her feelings.
data.processed:
󠁿Throughout this training camp, Silence Suzuka 
󠁿had not only improved her abilities, but had also 
󠁿grown enough to express her feelings.

title: At That Place, Wait For Me
